branchCategory.name: Flow Control
branchCategory.description: <p>Flow controllers have a broad range of applications and specialty focus such as air cylinder speed control use at low speed, and with residual pressure.&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: AQ
branchItem.description: <p>Quick exhaust series 90-AQ valve offers high flow capacity in a compact and lightweight body.&nbsp; 90-AQ is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The series is available in lip, diaphragm and an inline body shape with built-in one-touch fittings.&nbsp; The 90-AQ is available in a variety of port sizes</p>

branchItem.name: AKH
branchItem.description: <p>Check valve series 90-AKH offers various configurations to provide design solutions based on operating conditions.&nbsp; 90-AKH&nbsp;is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The series is compact and lightweight with low cracking pressure.&nbsp; The AKH with one-touch fitting, straight type, is easily installed in pipelines, while the male connector type can be mounted directly onto equipment.</p>
